title: Self Introduction
description: Introducing yourself for the first time.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 你好，我叫凯丽，很高兴认识你
dialog.pingyin: Ni hao, wo jiao kaili, hen gaoxin renshi ni.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.text: 你好，我叫克里斯，请多关照。
dialog.pingyin: Ni hao, wo jiao kelisi, qing duo guanzhao.

translation: A: Hello, my name is Kelley, nice to meet you.
B: Hello, my name is Chris, nice to meet you too.

title: Asking for Time
description: Asking what time it is now.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Bu haoyisi, xianzai ji dian le?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: San dian ban.

translation: A: Excuse me, what time is it now?
B: It's half past three.

title: Shopping

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Zhe ge duo shao qian?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Wu shi yuan.

translation: A: How much is this?
B: 50 yuan.

title: Ordering Food

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Qing wen you shenme tuijian de ma?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.text: 我们的招牌菜是红烧牛肉。
dialog.pingyin: Wo men de zhaopai cai shi hongshao niurou.

translation: A: Do you have any recommendations?
B: Our signature dish is braised beef.

title: Asking for Directions
description: Asking how to get to a specific place.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Qing wen, ditiezhan zenme zou?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Yi zhi zou ran hou zuo zhuan.

translation: A: Excuse me, how can I get to the subway station?
B: Go straight and then turn left.

title: Making a Reservation
description: Booking a table at a restaurant.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 你好，我想订一个四人桌。
dialog.pingyin: Ni hao, wo xiang ding yi ge si ren zhuo.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.text: 好的，请问是今天晚上吗？
dialog.pingyin: Hao de, qing wen shi jintian wanshang ma?

translation: A: Hello, I’d like to book a table for four.
B: Sure, is it for tonight?

title: Greeting a Friend
description: Meeting a friend after a long time.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 好久不见，你最近怎么样？
dialog.pingyin: Hao jiu bu jian, ni zuijin zenmeyang?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Wo hen hao, ni ne?

translation: A: Long time no see, how have you been?
B: I'm great, how about you?

title: Asking for Help
description: Asking for help in an emergency.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 不好意思，可以帮我一下吗？
dialog.pingyin: Bu haoyisi, keyi bang wo yi xia ma?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Dangran, zenme le?

translation: A: Excuse me, can you help me?
B: Of course, what’s wrong?

title: Making a Phone Call

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 你好，请问你们几点关门？
dialog.pingyin: Ni hao, qing wen nimen ji dian guanmen?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Wo men wanshang jiu dian guanmen.

translation: A: Hello, what time do you close?
B: We close at 9 PM.

title: At the Doctor's
description: Explaining your symptoms to a doctor.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Yi sheng, wo tou tong de hen lihai.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Hao de, wo bang ni jiancha yi xia.

translation: A: Doctor, I have a severe headache.
B: Okay, let me check for you.

title: Booking a Hotel
description: Making a reservation at a hotel.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 你好，我想订一个单人房。
dialog.pingyin: Ni hao, wo xiang ding yi ge dan ren fang.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Hao de, qing wen shi ji wan?

translation: A: Hello, I’d like to book a single room.
B: Sure, for how many nights?

title: Taking a Taxi
description: Giving directions to a taxi driver.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Qing dai wo qu jichang.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Hao de, qing ji hao anquan dai.

translation: A: Please take me to the airport.
B: Sure, please fasten your seatbelt.

title: At a Coffee Shop

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Wo yao yi bei nate, xiexie.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Hao de, qing shao deng.

translation: A: I’d like a latte, please.
B: Sure, please wait a moment.

title: Buying Tickets

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Wo yao yi zhang qu shanghai de piao.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Qing wen ji dian de che?

translation: A: I need a ticket to Shanghai.
B: What time is your train?

title: At a Park

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Jintian tianqi zhen hao.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Shi a, shihe sanbu.

translation: A: The weather is great today.
B: Yes, it’s perfect for a walk.

title: At a Post Office

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 我要寄一个包裹到美国。
dialog.pingyin: Wo yao ji yi ge baoguo dao meiguo.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Hao de, qing tianxie zhe ge biaoge.

translation: A: I’d like to send a package to the US.
B: Sure, please fill out this form.

title: Asking About Price
description: Discussing the price of an item.

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Zhe ge keyi pianyi yi dian ma?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Keyi, si shi wu kuai.

translation: A: Can you make this cheaper?
B: Sure, 45 yuan.

title: At the Bank

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Wo xiang kai yi ge yinhang zhanghu.

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Hao de, qing tigong shenfenzheng.

translation: A: I’d like to open a bank account.
B: Sure, please provide your ID.

title: At the Library

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 请问这里有《三国演义》吗？
dialog.pingyin: Qing wen zhe li you San Guo Yan Yi ma?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: You, zai di er pai.

translation: A: Do you have 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms' here?
B: Yes, it’s on the second shelf.

title: Taking the Bus

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 去博物馆的公交车是几路？
dialog.pingyin: Qu bowuguan de gongjiao che shi ji lu?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Zuo wu lu che.

translation: A: Which bus goes to the museum?
B: Take bus number 5.

title: Borrowing Something

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Wo keyi jie ni de bi ma?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Dangran keyi.

translation: A: Can I borrow your pen?
B: Of course.

title: At the Gym

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Zhe li you paobu ji ma?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: You, zai jiaoluo.

translation: A: Do you have treadmills here?
B: Yes, in the corner.

title: Talking About Hobbies

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Ni you shenme aihao?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Wo xihuan da lanqiu.

translation: A: What are your hobbies?
B: I like playing basketball.

title: At a Pharmacy

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: You ganmao yao ma?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: You, zhe li shi.

translation: A: Do you have cold medicine?
B: Yes, here it is.

title: At a Cafe

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Qing wen Wi-Fi mima shi shenme?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Mima shi yi er san si wu liu.

translation: A: What is the Wi-Fi password, please?
B: The password is 123456.

title: At the Airport

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Qing wen nali keyi zhi ji?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Qing dao guitai san.

translation: A: Where can I check in, please?
B: Please go to counter 3.

title: At the Supermarket

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Qing wen mianbao zai nali?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Zai di wu pai.

translation: A: Where is the bread, please?
B: It's in aisle 5.

title: At the Train Station

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.text: 开往北京的火车在哪个站台？
dialog.pingyin: Kai wang Beijing de huoche zai nage zhantai?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Zai er hao zhantai.

translation: A: Which platform is the train to Beijing?
B: Platform 2.

title: At the Office

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Huiyi ji dian kaishi?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: Shangwu shi dian.

translation: A: What time does the meeting start?
B: At 10 AM.

title: At a School

dialog.speaker: A
dialog.pingyin: Jintian you yingyu ke ma?

dialog.speaker: B
dialog.pingyin: You, zai xiawu san dian.

translation: A: Is there an English class today?
B: Yes, at 3 PM.
